main event: Two unidentified objects were sighted and observed for about 15 minutes in Fairborn, Ohio, on July 7, 1953.
interesting points: The objects were brightly illuminated and maneuvering erratically at high speed., The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes., The objects were noted to be at about 3000 feet altitude., Witness was driving in an automobile observing the sunset when the objects were noticed., The conclusion stated that the objects were probably Unidentified Flying Objects (UFOs).
sighted object: two unidentified and brightly illuminated objects
witness description: A 37-year-old male sailor who was driving when he observed the objects.
